body:
Comment 1: 
Much of the code presented in present is broken, from other languages, or otherwise
confusing to a syntax analyzer of any form. We'll end up with configuration, controls,
color choices, and debates for further feature requests. Just look at the endless trail
of CLs to keep the various text supporters in misc/ up to date.

This is a can of worms best left unopened.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
